hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that @ deserves a hug. Everyone does!

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #3# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Bow# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #2# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Shield#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Prelude of Light#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Prelude of Light#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Shield#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #the Spirit Temple Boss Key#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Forest Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground MQ Maze Path Third Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Bolero of Fire# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the path to #Volvagia#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree MQ Slingshot Room Back Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #4# major items.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to #Morpha#.
hinted_locations: LW GS Bean Patch Near Bridge

ZR (Near Grottos).text: Don't forget to write down your hints :)

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.
